remarks: Subtraction of both sides of 'less than or equal to'.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
leidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltnegd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltadd1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
leadd1dd.4 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
lesub2dd $p |- ( ph -> ( C - B ) <_ ( C - A ) ) $.
